data.prayer: Please, convict the 974,642 believers in New South Wales, Australia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of New South Wales, Australia

data.prayer: Please, teach the 974,642 believers in New South Wales, Australia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in New South Wales, Australia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of New South Wales, Australia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Swahili people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, help every believer in New South Wales, Australia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of New South Wales to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of New South Wales to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

location.name: New South Wales
location.people_groups_list: Jew, English-speaking, Punjabi, Somali, Sinhalese, Vietnamese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jew, English-speaking (114,000), Punjabi (134,000), Somali (14,000), Sinhalese (113,000), Vietnamese (227,000)
